Description: Charm: slab of clay with Arabic inscription being a seal impression.
Curator's comments: Slip 1756: 'In the name of God; Dust of our land (mixed) with the saliva of some of us.'
Published in Edward William Lane's (1836) 'An Account of the Manners and Customs of the Modern Egyptians' p. 349
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
